Devilcat snaps his fingers, and the Rogues follow him outside.

Pumpskin reverts to beast mode and merrily joins the procession.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Hydras smiled. "Well then let us head out to the enemy and beat 
the slag 
> outta them. His fire wings spread as he pulled his 
swords. "Quilldart 
> nightshade Quickstrike and Strika should stay here and guard the 
base. If 
> anything should come at us let me know immediatly. He turned and 
left walking 
> down the ramp. His eyes fixed in the direction of the maximal base. 
Proto and 
> Destructor stood beside him eager for battle.
